The Facebook post on the page: Kerja Jokowi" that has been shared over 3,000 times, which references Widodo's popular nickname and includes a translated caption supporting Jokowi.
The presence of popular Indonesian folk: identified as the bespectacled man wearing a green cap in the center of the image.
The reference to: Number 1" and "Number 2" in the caption, which correspond to Widodo's ballot number and his sole challenger Prabowo Subianto's ballot number in the upcoming elections.
